text: The code which calls `estimate_type` for each token (in oauthlib.oauth2.rfc6749.endpoints.resource) sorts them by the return value of `estimate_type` using the built-in `sorted` function. However, `BearerToken` seems to return a high value to indicate that it should be used while `sorted` defaults to ascending. One of these seems backwards.
title: BearerToken estimate_type may be backwards
